se.cbb.jprime.mcmc

Interface TuningParameter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    InfoProvider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProposerWeight
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConstantProposerWeight, ConstantTuningParameter, LinearProposerWeight, LinearTuningParameter

    public interface TuningParameter
extends InfoProvider
    Interface for tuning parameters of Proposer objects, i.e. parameters that typically define how large state changes Proposers suggest.

    A ProposerWeight constitutes a special kind of tuning parameter, since it governs how often a Proposer itself will be utilised.

    See also ConstantTuningParameter and LinearTuningParameter.

    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.
